title: Is there only one way to do philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is fact that there are 2 ways to do philosophy. #1 There is a logical way. #2 There is an illogical way. The logical way is in operation when the 3 Laws of Logic are the truth criteria and are implemented.. The Illogical way in in operation when the 3 Laws of Logic are violated or abandoned as truth criteria.

Is there one way to speak? Is there one way to listen? Is there another way to hear? What about feeling and senses like touch there are multiple ways to give and receive. As with philosophy there is no one way.
